Example

Ext.create('Ext.button.Split', {
    text: 'Choose an Action',
    width: 120,
    handler: function(b) {
        alert(b.sound);
    },
    menu: {
        defaults: {
            handler: function(b) {
                var parent = b.up('splitbutton');
                parent.setText(b.text);
                parent.sound = b.sound;
            }
        },
        items: [{
            text: 'Sing',
            sound: 'la la la'
        }, {
            text: 'Play Guitar',
            sound: 'strum'
        }, {
            text: 'Compose',
            sound: 'scribble'
        }]
    },
    renderTo: Ext.getBody(),
});
